price: “O you who disbelieve, make no excuses this Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.”
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
